= Mapping OpenCL C types to JavaCL =

Here are the different kinds of values accepted as kernel arguments in [http://nativelibs4java.sourceforge.net/sites/javacl/apidocs/com/nativelibs4java/opencl/CLKernel.html#setArgs(java.lang.Object...) CLKernel.setArgs]

== Scalar data types ==

|| *[http://www.khronos.org/opencl/sdk/1.0/docs/man/xhtml/scalarDataTypes.html OpenCL C type]* || *JavaCL type* ||
|| int/uint || int ||
|| long/ulong || long ||
|| short/ushort || short ||
|| char/uchar || byte ||
|| float || float ||
|| double || double ||
|| size_t, ptrdiff_t, intptr_t, uintptr_t || [http://jnaerator.sourceforge.net/sites/jnaerator-runtime/apidocs/com/ochafik/lang/jnaerator/runtime/NativeSize.html NativeSize] ||

== Vector data types ==
|| * [http://www.khronos.org/opencl/sdk/1.0/docs/man/xhtml/vectorDataTypes.html OpenCL C type]* || *JavaCL type* ||
|| int2, int3, int4, int8... || int`[]` ||

|| __global long`*` || [http://nativelibs4java.sourceforge.net/sites/javacl/apidocs/com/nativelibs4java/opencl/CLLongBuffer.html CLLongBuffer]  ||
|| __global short`*` || [http://nativelibs4java.sourceforge.net/sites/javacl/apidocs/com/nativelibs4java/opencl/CLShortBuffer.html CLShortBuffer]  ||
|| __global char`*` || [http://nativelibs4java.sourceforge.net/sites/javacl/apidocs/com/nativelibs4java/opencl/CLByteBuffer.html CLByteBuffer]  ||
|| __global float`*` || [http://nativelibs4java.sourceforge.net/sites/javacl/apidocs/com/nativelibs4java/opencl/CLFloatBuffer.html CLFloatBuffer]  ||
|| __global double`*` || [http://nativelibs4java.sourceforge.net/sites/javacl/apidocs/com/nativelibs4java/opencl/CLDoubleBuffer.html CLDoubleBuffer]  ||

== Local Arguments ==

Their memory storage is shared by all the work items in the same work group

|| *OpenCL C type* || *JavaCL type* ||
|| local int`*` || [http://nativelibs4java.sourceforge.net/sites/javacl/apidocs/com/nativelibs4java/opencl/CLKernel.LocalSize.html LocalSize] : Mere indication of the size of a local argument ||
